pastry-cream-buns.Title: Pastry Cream Buns
Ingredients:
Ingredients
Yeast dough:
25 g (2.7 tbsp) fresh yeast or 10 g (3.5 tsp) dry yeast
25 g (2 tbsp) sugar
250 ml (1 cup) milk
200 g (7 oz) butter
450 – 500 g (3 3/4 cups) all-purpose flour, plus some for dusting and kneading
a pinch of salt
Cream pastry:
4 egg yolks
100 g (1/2 cup) sugar
500 ml (2 cups) milk
50 g (1/3 cup) all-purpose flour
a pinch of salt
Crumbles:
45 g (1/3 cup) all-purpose flour
25 g (2 tbsp) sugar
30 g (1 oz) unsalted butter (cold)
a pinch of salt
Top:
a few berries
1 egg
